description.verify:
In order to get access to this Server, you will have to complete a quick verification to lower the risk of Bot attacks and to ensure overhaul security {emote}

Please note the Admins and Mods do not have access to any of your provided information such as email address or IPs.
description.premium:
Thank you for being an {bot} Pro member and supporting this project {emote}

Note that you do not need to pass the verification manually as skipping verification is part of your Enterprise plan.
